channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: Soho House 的控股股东暗示该会员制俱乐部私有化的进展后，Soho House 创下一年多来的最大涨幅。
item.description:
Soho House jumped the most in more than a year after its controlling shareholder hinted at progress around the members-only club going private https://t.co/O3IpjmXfI7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: memecoins的反弹推动了Solana的飙升，这种加密货币在山姆-班克曼-弗里德的FTX交易所倒闭时几乎消亡。
item.description:
The rally in memecoins is powering a surge in Solana, the cryptocurrency that almost died amid the collapse of Sam Bankman-Fried’s FTX exchange. https://t.co/YFMiJdLDIm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 德国央行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）对欧洲仍未完成所谓的银行业联盟表示失望
item.description:
Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel voiced his frustration that Europe still hasn’t completed the so-called banking union https://t.co/03i9FLe7hQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 墨西哥总统安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔（Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador）表示，随着墨西哥国家石油公司（Pemex）努力提高产量，墨西哥将继续为该公司提供支持。
item.description:
Mexico President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador said the nation will continue to support state oil producer Pemex as the company works to ramp up production https://t.co/FnFjh4CpRC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 欧盟已制定法律，乌克兰最早将于 7 月开始接收被冻结的俄罗斯主权资产所产生的利润
item.description:
The EU has prepared legislation that would see Ukraine start to receive profits generated by frozen Russian sovereign assets as early as July https://t.co/dXNu6jjTjK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在佛罗里达州高速铁路系统 Brightline 披露 2024 年预计乘客量下降 21% 三个月后，该公司再次下调了预测值
item.description:
Three months after Florida’s high-speed rail system, Brightline, disclosed a 21% decline in projected ridership for 2024, it’s cutting its forecast again https://t.co/uyWrzpRiJk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 埃克森公司表示愿意与雪佛龙公司就其收购赫斯公司的提议进行讨论，因为这两家石油巨头正在争论该交易对圭亚那海上石油项目的影响。
item.description:
Exxon said it is open to talking to Chevron about its proposed takeover of Hess as the oil giants spar over the deal’s implications for an offshore oil project in Guyana https://t.co/be1mMiySw2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 一项新的调查发现，美国人越来越怀疑自己能否获批贷款买车或为抵押贷款再融资
item.description:
Americans increasingly doubt they’ll get approved for a loan to buy a car or refinance a mortgage, a new survey finds https://t.co/LXEwPDFYXs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 欧洲央行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺表示，削减欧洲央行借贷成本有助于防止欧元区经济衰退
item.description:
Cutting ECB borrowing costs could help prevent a euro-area recession, Governing Council member Mario Centeno says https://t.co/LoShwTw2wD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 由于金属价格低迷，安派拉铂金公司津巴布韦分公司正在为员工提供自愿裁员计划以削减成本
item.description:
Impala Platinum’s Zimbabwean unit is offering staff voluntary redundancy packages to cut costs because of anemic metal prices https://t.co/0RGH0VkvbX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔不愿透露大流行病后美国经济发生了哪些变化
item.description:
Jerome Powell has been reluctant to say how the US economy has changed since the pandemic https://t.co/88AVwdPWxJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 每过一周，瑞希-苏纳克对英国政治叙事的掌控力似乎都在减弱。
item.description:
With each new week, Rishi Sunak’s grip on the UK political narrative appears to be diminishing. https://t.co/2IDxX77See

item.title: 了解美国财政部非凡影响力的途径
item.description:
The way to understand the extraordinary reach of the US Treasury https://t.co/TQE6366NTT

item.title: 贡渥集团首席执行官托尔比约恩-托恩奎斯特（Torbjörn Törnqvist）表示，乌克兰的无人机袭击导致俄罗斯每天约 60 万桶的炼油能力被摧毁。
item.description:
About 600,000 barrels of Russia’s daily oil-refining capacity has been knocked out by Ukrainian drone strikes, says Gunvor CEO Torbjörn Törnqvist https://t.co/fyUX3wdPVU

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 对冲基金再次对美国证券交易委员会发起法律诉讼，这次是针对要求一些公司注册为美国国债市场交易商的新规定。
item.description:
Hedge funds launched another legal salvo against the Securities and Exchange Commission, this time over new rules requiring some firms to register as dealers in the US Treasuries market https://t.co/H8on63O0xK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 古斯塔沃-彼得罗正试图为他修改哥伦比亚宪法的努力争取民众支持，但由于立法和司法方面的障碍，这一努力成功的几率很小
item.description:
Gustavo Petro is trying to build popular support for his bid to overhaul Colombia’s constitution, which faces long odds of success given legislative and judicial hurdles https://t.co/8UvDS4Ia60

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 霸菱集团在 20 多名员工加入新贵 Corinthia 后，在向新领导层过渡期间暂停对旗下私人信贷基金进行新的投资。
item.description:
Barings is pausing making new investments across its private credit funds while they transition to new leadership, after over 20 employees left for upstart Corinthia https://t.co/pSoyh8n2yu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 国际清算银行（BIS）行长卡斯滕斯表示，各国央行不能过早宣布战胜通胀，可能还得坚持提高利率一段时间
item.description:
Central banks mustn’t declare victory over inflation too soon and might have to stick with higher interest rates for a while, BIS chief Carstens says https://t.co/F4RQQtX6T9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: Partners Group 与其竞争对手一道，努力争取药品、娱乐、体育和其他特许权使用费投资。
item.description:
Partners Group is joining its rivals in a push for drug, entertainment, sports and other royalties investing https://t.co/g5dTe3EFmq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 本周对英国经济非常重要，因为将有通胀数据和利率决定。那么，为什么保守党议员反而忙于谋划呢？与 @AllegraStratton 一起来了解详情。
item.description:
This week is important for the UK economy, with inflation data and an interest rate decision. So why are Conservative MPs instead preoccupied with plotting? Get The Readout with @AllegraStratton https://t.co/ihy4GlRHGb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，德勤正寻求在市场放缓前彻底改革其结构以削减成本
item.description:
Deloitte is looking to overhaul its structure to cut costs ahead of a market slowdown, according to the Financial Times https://t.co/wcQTlOEVg1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: Tishman Speyer 从高盛集团手中买下了其在泽西城海滨开发的公寓楼下的土地
item.description:
Tishman Speyer bought land beneath apartments it’s developing on the Jersey City waterfront, from Goldman Sachs https://t.co/3ktA3CNJbZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 可可的历史性涨势没有放缓的迹象。这些图表解释了前所未有的涨势以及可能出现的情况
item.description:
Cocoa's historic rally shows no sign of slowing. These charts explain the unprecedented advance and what may come https://t.co/uiVzmGH8Ss

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 美国汽车工人联合会（United Auto Workers）正在为大众汽车田纳西州工厂的工会投票请愿，这是对这个最近重获新生的工会组织影响力的一次关键考验。
item.description:
The United Auto Workers is petitioning for a unionization vote at Volkswagen’s Tennessee plant, teeing up a crucial test of the recently reinvigorated labor group’s clout. https://t.co/H3bTMzX1Zg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 两艘运载俄罗斯石油的油轮在印度西海岸闲置了三个多星期，没有任何迹象表明它们将在何时卸货
item.description:
Two tankers carrying Russian oil have been idling off the West Coast of India for more than three weeks without any indication of when they will unload https://t.co/85RlUpbyKa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 由于能源转让公司与竞争对手天然气项目开发商之间的法律纠纷，路易斯安那州的一条输气管道被推迟铺设
item.description:
A Louisiana pipeline has been delayed as a legal battle rages between Energy Transfer and rival natural gas project developers https://t.co/zvWUjKKjIy

item.title: 债券交易员继续降低对美联储今年降息的预期，不再认为 6 月降息的可能性大于不降息的可能性
item.description:
Bond traders continue to lower their expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts this year and no longer consider a June rate cut likelier than not https://t.co/Z1tZb8iPpD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）表示，国际货币基金组织正在关注法院对加纳严厉的反男女同性恋、双性恋和变性者法案提出的质疑。
item.description:
The IMF is monitoring a court challenge to Ghana’s draconian anti-LGBTQ bill, according to its Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva https://t.co/Kr4KqQjXo1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 英国去年用于住宅和建筑节能的预算为 4.78 亿英镑，但却没有使用，这是政府经济去碳化计划的最新挫折。
item.description:
The UK failed to spend £478 million of last year’s budget for making homes and buildings greener, in the latest setback to government initiatives to decarbonize the economy https://t.co/n39g7IcTuu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024
